thread.title: Action Park's Zero G Slide Takes Riders 540 Feet in 15 Seconds

title: Action Park's Zero G Slide Takes Riders 540 Feet in 15 Seconds
text:
Action Park's Zero G Slide Takes Riders 540 Feet in 15 Seconds Take a ride on the 10-story Zero G slide at Action Park in Vernon, New Jersey. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
